text: Quett Ketumile Joni Masire, GCMG (23 July 1925 - 22 June 2017) was a Botswana politician. He was the second President of Botswana for the Botswana Democratic Party from 1980 to 1998 serving for 17 years. He was born in Kanye. Masire died in Gaborone, Botswana on 22 June 2017 from surgical complications at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1925 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Presidents of Botswana Category:Vice presidents of Botswana
title: Quett Masire
